item.title: Buffalo State SUNY
item.description: Buffalo State, a SUNY campus located in Buffalo, New York’s Elmwood Village, offers degrees in education, the arts, science, and professional studies. Each year, nearly 12,000 students choose Buffalo State for its broad array of high-quality and distinctive academic programs, diverse and creative environment, hands-on learning opportunities, affordable SUNY tuition, and location in the heart of Buffalo’s cultural corridor.
